ctx: intros p q r Hp Hq Hr.
exceptions.tactic: apply pluspf_assoc with (p := p) (q := q) (r := r); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p, q, r : list (Term A n) Hp : eqP A eqA n p q Hq : canonical A0 eqA ltM p Hr : canonical A0 eqA ltM q Unable to unify "canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (pluspf (pluspf p q) r) (pluspf p (pluspf q r))" with "canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (pluspf p r) (pluspf q r)".

b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} H : forall p q r : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (pluspf (pluspf p q) r) (pluspf p (pluspf q r)) A1 : A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A p, q, r : list (Term A n) Hp : eqP A eqA n p q H1 : olist (A:=A) ltM r H2 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) r H0 : olist (A:=A) ltM q H3 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) q H4 : olist (A:=A) ltM p H5 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) A1_diff_A0 : eqA A1 A0 -> False eqA_ref : reflexive A eqA eqA_sym : symmetric A eqA eqA_trans : transitive A eqA plusA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c)) (plusA (plusA a b) c) plusA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a) plusA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c d) plusA_A0 : forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0) invA_plusA : forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a)) invA_eqA_comp : forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b) minusA_def : forall a b : A, eqA (minusA a b) (plusA a (invA b)) multA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c d) multA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (multA a (multA b c)) (multA (multA a b) c) multA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a) multA_dist_l : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA (multA c a) (multA c b)) (multA c (plusA a b)) multA_A0_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0 multA_A1_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a divA_rew : forall (a b : A) (nZ1 nZ2 : eqA b A0 -> False), divA a b nZ1 = divA a b nZ2 divA_is_multA : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b) divA_eqA_comp : forall (a b c d : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZd : eqA d A0 -> False), eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c d nZd) divA_multA_comp_r : forall (a b c : A) (nZc : eqA c A0 -> False), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA (divA a c nZc) b) divA_invA_r : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZib : eqA (invA b) A0 -> False), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb)) Unable to unify "canonical A0 eqA ltM q" with "eqP A eqA n (pluspf p r) (pluspf q r)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall p q r : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (pluspf p r) (pluspf q r)

Premises:
canonical : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
pluspf = fun l1 l2 : list (Term A n) => projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (l1, l2)) (snd (l1, l2)) a) (plusp (l1, l2)) : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) Arguments pluspf (_ _)%list_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d

eqP : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
inright : ?B -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]

eqp_imp_canonical : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]

ltp_eqp_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q r s : list (Term A n)), ltP (A:=A) ltM p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> eqP A eqA n p r -> eqP A eqA n q s -> ltP (A:=A) ltM r s
ltP_pX_canonical : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
moreCoefStructure.A_sep : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0
nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)

multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
plusP_uniq_eqP : forall p q r s : list (Term A n), plusP p q r -> plusP p q s -> eqP A eqA n r s
plusP_com : forall p q r s : list (Term A n), plusP p q r -> plusP q p s -> eqP A eqA n r s
nzeroP_comp_eqTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
zeroP_comp_eqTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b

zeroP_dec : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x : Term A n), {zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x} + {~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x}
canonical_imp_in_nzero : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> forall a : Term A n, In a p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a

```coq
intros p q r Hp Hq Hr.
apply pluspf_assoc with (p := p) (q := q) (r := r); auto.
apply eqp_imp_canonical with (A := A) (A0 := A0) (A1 := A1) (eqA := eqA) (plusA := plusA) (invA := invA) (minusA := minusA) (multA := multA) (divA := divA) (n := n) (ltM := ltM) (p := p) (q := q); auto.
Qed.

original: intros p q r Hp Hq Hr. apply pluspf_assoc with (p := p) (q := q) (r := r); auto. apply eqp_imp_canonical with (A := A) (A0 := A0) (A1 := A1) (eqA := eqA) (plusA := plusA) (invA := invA) (minusA := minusA) (multA := multA) (divA := divA) (n := n) (ltM := ltM) (p := p) (q := q); auto.
